name: BindResource
description: an interface that allows a resource to be bound to the gpu in a bind group

properties.name: _resourceType
properties.description: The type of resource this is

properties.name: _resourceId
properties.description: Unique id for this resource this can change and is used to link the gpu

properties.name: destroyed
properties.description: a boolean that indicates if the resource has been destroyed. If true, the resource should not be used and any bind groups that will release any references to this resource.

properties.name: event
